title: Measurement in the metal working industry. No.4. Verniers
brief_description: A detailed study of the principles of the vernier scale, and its application to precision measurment, using animation and direct photography. The care of vernier-scaled tools is emphasised; particular care must be taken of such tools if they are to maintain their accuracy.
